connection_param_s Struct Reference


Data Fields

int socket
int dptc_fd
int log_fd

Detailed Description

This structure holds the parameters passed to a new communication thread.

Field Documentation

int dptc_fd

File descriptor number of DPTC driver.

int log_fd

File descriptor number of DPTC proc file system file used for reading the DPTC log buffer.

int socket

File descriptor number of the socket used for communication.
